description: T12 Various x 5  (black thorn, pittosporum and smoke tree), cut back to give 1.5m clearance- ensure laurel and sweet mock orange bushes are cut back from air-con units;T13Common Plum x 1 (Prunus domestica), cut back from building to give 1m clearance- lift to 2.5m; T13 Cherry Plum x 4 (Prunus myrobalan), reduce height by 2m, cut back from garden into line with trimmed lower hedge, trim back barberry opposite by 0.5m; T12	Ash x 1 (Fraxinus excelsior) cut back from meadow house to give 1.5m; T17 Hornbeam x 1	(Carpinus betulus) cut back and lift over car park road only to 2.5; T17 Hornbeam x 1 (Carpinus betulus) cut back and lift over car park road only to 2.5m; T17 Sycamore x 1	(Acer pseudoplatanus)  lift to 3m; T183 Oak x 1 cut back by 1.5m to ensure camera can see the car park; T184 Hornbeam x 1 (Carpinus betulus) Cut back by 1.5-2m; T201 Acer spp x 1 remove dead limb; T200 Acacia spp x 1 T cut back
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
